pkgmetadata.longdescription: # PDPilotAn interactive Jupyter widget for exploring partial dependence plots.![Screenshot](screenshot.png?raw=true)To see the widget in action, check out this [Colab notebook](https://colab.research.google.com/github/danielkerrigan/pdpilot/blob/main/examples/colab-example.ipynb).The easiest way to install the widget is through pip:```pip install pdpilot```See the [documentation](https://pdpilot.readthedocs.io/) for usage details.
